title: “Designed by criminals, for criminals”: Operation Trojan Shield
description: The Anom was the holy grail of dark, illegal communication: a mobile phone that could send encrypted messages, and even included a secret Kill-Switch to foil attempts by law enforcement agents to get to its contents. Thousands of criminals used the Anom, certain that they were completely safe from the police... They were wrong.

Thousands of criminals used the Anom, certain that they were completely safe from the police… They were wrong.
